trans-unit.source: Provides data for preprocess input events.
trans-unit.target: 前置處理輸入事件提供資料。

trans-unit.source: Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
trans-unit.target: 取消前置處理的輸入，就會停止進一步處理輸入。

trans-unit.source: Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
trans-unit.target: 接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>決定如果另一個處理常式取消前置處理的輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的臨時區域處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]事件。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event handlers are called, even if one of the handlers cancels the input.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>會呼叫事件處理常式，即使其中一個處理常式取消輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: To verify if a handler further up the tree canceled the input, listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認是否處理常式進一步樹狀結構向上取消輸入，接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: PreProcessInputEventArgs is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用 PreProcessInputEventArgs<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1.
trans-unit.target: 在處理輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]後續階段中︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: 前置處理階段。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: 預先通知階段。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]輸入的事件所引發。

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: 通知後階段。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: 後置處理階段。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的管理員引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the processing of the input event.
trans-unit.target: 取消處理輸入事件。

trans-unit.source: Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
trans-unit.target: 取消前置處理的輸入，就會停止進一步處理輸入。

trans-unit.source: Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
trans-unit.target: 接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>決定如果另一個處理常式取消前置處理的輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether processing of the input event was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否已取消處理輸入事件。

trans-unit.source: Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
trans-unit.target: 取消前置處理的輸入，就會停止進一步處理輸入。

trans-unit.source: Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
trans-unit.target: 接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>決定如果另一個處理常式取消前置處理的輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the processing was canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已取消處理。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
